<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[18, 30, 170, 64]]<|/det|>
Steigung 

<|ref|>image<|/ref|><|det|>[[44, 72, 206, 144]]<|/det|>
 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[70, 66, 150, 144]]<|/det|>
\(p\) \(100m\)

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[300, 64, 450, 101]]<|/det|>
tan \(\varphi\) = \(\frac{x}{100}\)

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[18, 184, 825, 219]]<|/det|>
Darstellung von Sinnfunktion im Zeigerdiagramm : 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[46, 225, 410, 256]]<|/det|>
\(y(x) = A \cdot \sin(wx + \varphi)\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[480, 227, 710, 255]]<|/det|>
w : Kreisfrequenz 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[480, 256, 800, 295]]<|/det|>
\(T = \frac{2\pi}{\omega}\) (Periodendauer)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[76, 303, 279, 332]]<|/det|>
A : Amplitude 

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[76, 343, 319, 372]]<|/det|>
\(\varphi\) : Phasenwinkel 

<|ref|>image<|/ref|><|det|>[[125, 380, 450, 530]]<|/det|>
 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[480, 408, 645, 460]]<|/det|>
\(A \cdot \sin(wx + \varphi)\)

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[135, 558, 496, 585]]<|/det|>
bei \(x = 0\) : \(y(0) = A \cdot \sin \varphi\) 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[195, 595, 576, 624]]<|/det|>
\(x \ge 0\) : \(y(x) = A \cdot \sin(wx + \varphi)\)

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[18, 653, 675, 687]]<|/det|>
Uberlagerung gleichliquenter Schwingungen : 

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[58, 693, 430, 725]]<|/det|>
\(y_1(x) = A_1 \sin(wx + \varphi_1)\)

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[58, 733, 430, 765]]<|/det|>
\(y_2(x) = A_2 \sin(wx + \varphi_2)\)

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[58, 770, 667, 805]]<|/det|>
\[\rightarrow y(x) = y_1(x) + y_2(x) = A \sin(wx + \varphi)\]

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[458, 855, 960, 920]]<|/det|>
\(u_1 = A_1 \cdot \cos \varphi_1\) \(v_1 = A_1 \cdot \sin \varphi_1\)

<|ref|>equation<|/ref|><|det|>[[458, 890, 966, 920]]<|/det|>
\(u_2 = A_2 \cdot \cos \varphi_2\) \(v_2 = A_2 \cdot \sin \varphi_2\)
